name: Request a Leave
description: Need some time off? This assistant helps you write a formal leave request email in seconds.
tip: Include dates and a brief reason to make the email more effective.

name: Request a Meeting
description: Set up a meeting with clarity and professionalism using this assistant.
tip: Mention preferred dates, times, and the meeting's purpose for clarity.

name: Follow Up on Application
description: Haven't heard back after applying? Use this to craft a polite and effective follow-up.
tip: Reference the job title and the date of your original application.

name: Resignation Email
description: Leaving your job? This assistant helps you exit professionally with a respectful resignation email.
tip: State your intent clearly and optionally offer a notice period.

name: Client Proposal
description: Pitch your service or product with a compelling, professional proposal email.
tip: Be clear about the value you offer and include a call to action.

name: Apology Email
description: Make things right. Use this bot to write a sincere, professional apology email.
tip: Be brief, honest, and take accountability.
